languages.text: "Зачем ты спрашиваешь об очевидном? Потому что так ты изыщешь свое вдохновение для будущих боев. Так ты проверишь свое оружие и свои рефлексы, найдешь изъяны в движении и технике. И так ты, наконец, разбудишь свою жажду и будешь трепетать перед грядущим испытанием, жаждя окунуться в сечу!"

"Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"
languages.original_text: "Зачем ты спрашиваешь об очевидном? Потому что так ты изыщешь свое вдохновение для будущих боев. Так ты проверишь свое оружие и свои рефлексы, найдешь изъяны в движении и технике. И так ты, наконец, разбудишь свою жажду и будешь трепетать перед грядущим испытанием, жаждя окунуться в сечу!"

traits.locale_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “这还要问吗？因为通过这场盛宴，你会找到未来战斗的灵感。你可以借机会，测试你的武器和临场应变能力，寻找动作与技巧中的漏洞，最终唤醒对接下来这场战斗的饥渴与期待，不顾一切地投身于战斗之中！”
languages.original_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"

traits.locale_text: “这还要问吗？因为通过这场盛宴，你会找到未来战斗的灵感。你可以借机会，测试你的武器和临场应变能力，寻找动作与技巧中的漏洞，最终唤醒对接下来这场战斗的饥渴与期待，不顾一切地投身于战斗之中！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué cuestionas lo que es evidente? Porque así hallarás la inspiración para tus futuras batallas. Porque así pondrás a prueba tus armas y tus reflejos, y detectarás fallos en tus movimientos y técnicas. ¡Y porque así despertarás por fin tu voracidad y tu expectación ante el inminente desafío, y con ello te lanzarás con presteza al fragor del combate!».
languages.original_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué cuestionas lo que es evidente? Porque así hallarás la inspiración para tus futuras batallas. Porque así pondrás a prueba tus armas y tus reflejos, y detectarás fallos en tus movimientos y técnicas. ¡Y porque así despertarás por fin tu voracidad y tu expectación ante el inminente desafío, y con ello te lanzarás con presteza al fragor del combate!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez que oui. C'est ainsi que vous trouverez l'inspiration pour vos prochains combats. C'est le meilleur moyen de mettre vos armes et vos réflexes à l'épreuve, d'identifier les faiblesses dans vos mouvements et vos techniques. Et c'est en combattant ainsi que vous éveillerez votre soif dévorante de plonger au cœur de la bataille, d'affronter votre prochain défi ! »
languages.original_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez que oui. C'est ainsi que vous trouverez l'inspiration pour vos prochains combats. C'est le meilleur moyen de mettre vos armes et vos réflexes à l'épreuve, d'identifier les faiblesses dans vos mouvements et vos techniques. Et c'est en combattant ainsi que vous éveillerez votre soif dévorante de plonger au cœur de la bataille, d'affronter votre prochain défi ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Warum fragt Ihr, was offensichtlich ist? Nur so findet Ihr die nötige Inspiration für zukünftige Schlachten. Nur so testet Ihr Eure Waffen und Reflexe und findet Schwachstellen in Euren Bewegungen und Techniken. Und nur so weckt Ihr Euren Hunger und Eure Vorfreude auf die bevorstehende Herausforderung und könnt Euch dann voller Tatendrang ins Getümmel stürzen!"
languages.original_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum fragt Ihr, was offensichtlich ist? Nur so findet Ihr die nötige Inspiration für zukünftige Schlachten. Nur so testet Ihr Eure Waffen und Reflexe und findet Schwachstellen in Euren Bewegungen und Techniken. Und nur so weckt Ihr Euren Hunger und Eure Vorfreude auf die bevorstehende Herausforderung und könnt Euch dann voller Tatendrang ins Getümmel stürzen!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜ見え透いたことを尋ねる？なぜなら、それが将来の戦いのためのインスピレーションを見つける方法だからさ。そうやって自分の武器や反射神経を試し、自分の動きや技術の欠点を見つけるってわけだ。そうすることでやっと、来るべき困難への飢えと期待が目覚め、戦いに飛び込む意欲が湧いてくるのさ！」
languages.original_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ見え透いたことを尋ねる？なぜなら、それが将来の戦いのためのインスピレーションを見つける方法だからさ。そうやって自分の武器や反射神経を試し、自分の動きや技術の欠点を見つけるってわけだ。そうすることでやっと、来るべき困難への飢えと期待が目覚め、戦いに飛び込む意欲が湧いてくるのさ！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Aşikâr olanı neden soruyorsun? Gerekli çünkü gelecekteki savaşların için ilhamını bu şekilde bulacaksın. Silahlarını ve reflekslerini böyle teste tabi tutacak, hareketlerin ve tekniklerindeki pürüzleri böyle fark edeceksin. Ayrıca bu şekilde bizi bekleyen mücadele için açlığını ve beklentilerini sonunda açığa çıkararak çatışmaya dalma arzusuyla yanıp tutuşacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Why do you ask the obvious? Because it is how you will find your inspiration for future battles. It is how you will test your weapons and your reflexes, and find flaws in your movements and techniques. And it is how you will finally awaken your hunger and anticipation for the coming challenge, leaving you eager to plunge into the fray!"

Silahlarını ve reflekslerini böyle teste tabi tutacak, hareketlerin ve tekniklerindeki pürüzleri böyle fark edeceksin.
